post.body: the convention center is running their sprinklers right now... When its raining buckets.
Make sure you hide any SF Giants merchandise you might be carrying with you. You don't want to end up getting hurt down here.
The TV station that covers it.
love the breaking news but hate the useless news teases.
Is it worth it to pay for expensive chemo? Of course it is.
just saw you at pico and hoover. Stopping in ktown tonight?
For shame rick, A fancy latino like yourself should tweet el español con la eñe intacta! La Real Academia se va a enojar!
Do you guys have a breaking news only twitter? These non-stories filler crap is really annoying.
Do you ever sleep sir?
Last tweet was supposed to read "hacked" not "hacke". Silly me.
Insomniac. Read HuckFinn, Fahrenheit451, Hitchhikers, & even my EconForDummies book again. 2day I get a new charger and normality sets in.
It's december. The thought is kinda depressing.
Day 3 of dead macbook situation. I have no idea what is happening in the world. Frightened.
My macbooks charger is fucked. I miss you internetworld.
- Going to overdose on tryptophan tonight.
I'd rather be at the My Brightest Diamond concert than here.
Coordinated terrorist attacks in Mumbai, India. 80+ killed, 20+ taken hostage. Taj Hotel on fire. Ongoing.
Walking around in the rain. Im soaking wet. Awesome!
I'd rather be at the hold steady concert than here.
I'd rather be at the Decemberists concert than here.
Nothing would help my state-of-mind more than some rain.
Watching the first episode of "The I.T. Crowd" series 3.
Watching the MLS cup on tv. I think the ever growing adoption of HDTV will help soccer gain more popularity in the USA.
redo: Make it a responsible adult night! (ewww)
Make it a blue moon night!
incomitatus
KROQ's Acoustic Xmas night one sucks sweaty monkey balls. Night 2 is pretty good except for Paramore.
Set up LastFMProxy so I can listen to Last.fm on my xbox360 while playing forza and pretending I'm a race car driver.
Alive.
About to get a new charger. http://tinyurl.com/69hxsb
Canceled XM. Long live Last.fm.
Just saw a mustang convertible. Ah yes the last thing i want in a car that handles like a model t is a roof. Yuck.
5.5 Earthquake out in Barstow. Some people felt it in LA. Didnt feel it here in ktown.
It is so enjoyable to watch Bob Nardelli (CEO Chrysler/exCEO of HomeDepot) BEG congress for money. That man is a fucking executive cancer.
All nighters are awesome when you actually solve the problem you've been working on... all night. Now to catch some zzz
Piratebay == alive! IT Crowd for me tonight!!
Piratebay trackers == down. No IT Crowd for me tonight.
Writers-fucking-block is killing me.
This is why I love the Decemberists: "Hazards of Love 1 (The Prettiest Whistles Won't Wrestle the Thistles Undone)".
Blagojevic is fucking insane. What a corrupt douche.
At the santa monica pier enjoying the beauty of the nothingness that lays before me.
In buena park. Just had portillos. Now experiencing culture shock at an oc walmart.
Watching the Anaheim Ducks game. Carnage!
Watching CSPAN2 -- Auto Bailout bill debate. Laugh at me all you want!!!
Street sweeping day. Parked my car near the Korean supermarket. May god/Flying SpaghettiMonster have mercy upon my vehicle.</playfulb ...
Listening to Willie Nelson and Wynton Marsalis' collab "Two Men With the Blues". Great record.
Wow Subaru dropped out of the WRC. Damn economy affecting motorsports.
Feverish. Cold. Hateful. Spiteful. Pitiful. Word of the day: douchevolution - the slow, unconscious process of turning into a douchebag.
Watching the newest Top Gear episode fresh from the BitTorrent oven of joy, and everything that is good and legal in the world...
Trying to figure out why Youtube is loading in Polish. Password hacke by a Polish plumber?
Earl Gray tea + La Liga on GolTV = Relaxing winter sunday.
I just watched Kanye West take a huge diarrhea dump ("enhanced" by AutoTune) on SNL.
Freezing my ass off. Current high in LA is 55 degrees Fahrenheit. How can the rest of the world deal with these types of temps?
Realizing I stayed up all night and didn't really accomplish much/anything at all.
Happy holidays ya'll!
Still up. Still trying to find out why I can no longer connect to my network via wifi. Cat5 cables are so 2003!
Finally disabled tapping on my trackpad on kubuntu. I'm a happier person now.
Installing Ubuntu on my macbook.
Good morning!
Awake since 10ish AM yesterday. Delirious. Eyes twitching. This is how tweakers must feel.
Enjoying his shiny 32" plasma, Winter Solstice present.
= Idiot. Tired of watching autocorrect correct me every time i write "receiver". "I" before "E", except after "C"!!!!!!
Metallica acoustic set tonight in Eagle Rock. $5 with toy/$7 without, Center for the Arts. Sounds tempting for the trainwreck potential.
RIP W. Mark Felt aka "Deep Throat". Thanks for the history.
Hexakosioihexekontahexaphobia (fear of the number 666) - another in the long list of irrational things based on Christianity.
